biography:
He was born in Chicago and graduated from the University of Illinois,  and studied painting at the Art Institute of Chicago.

Among those who sat for him were President Franklin D. Roosevelt; Benjamin F. Fairless, president of United States Steel, and Oscar of the Waldorf, the well-known manager of the Waldorf-Astoria.  His work is in many museums, including the Atlanta Museum of Fine Arts.
http://www.askart.com/AskART/artists/biography.aspx?artist=24207
